name: The Yellow-Haired Villain in the Female Main Characters Novel Wants Happiness
author: You and I are not fish
content: [From the Same Studio as the Manhua &quotShut Up, Evil Dragon!&quot]Transmigrating into the body of a yellow-haired villain in the early stages of a Yuri novel, Moon only wants to survive. But… why does the story seem to be going off track?The princess has already been drugged, and even her pants have been removed—so why hasn&#039t the protagonist appeared yet? Why does the protagonist’s childhood friend, a noble and pure saint, keep giving me flirtatious looks? Even my obedient and loyal person
